meanings.definition: An unbroken view of a wide area.
meanings.sent1: The panorama from the hilltop was breathtaking.
meanings.sent2: I took a photo of the city panorama from the observation deck.
meanings.sent3: The birds enjoyed a panoramic view of the park from their nest.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes scanned the panorama of books in the library.
meanings.sent5: The artist painted a vivid panorama of the countryside.

meanings.definition: A picture or series of pictures representing a continuous scene.
meanings.sent1: The museum displayed a beautiful panorama of landscapes.
meanings.sent2: I bought a postcard with a lovely panorama of the beach.
meanings.sent3: The children giggled at the panorama of funny animal drawings.
meanings.sent4: Her phone screensaver showed a colorful panorama of flowers.
meanings.sent5: The photographer captured a stunning panorama of the sunset.
